verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician בִּנְגִינֹ֗ת <S%H5058><s%> on Neginoth מַשְׂכִּ֥יל <S%H4905><s%> Maschil לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> [A Psalm] of David בְּב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> came הַ֭זִּיפִים <S%H2130><s%> when the Ziphims וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> and said לְשָׁא֑וּל <S%H7586><s%> to Saul הֲלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not דָ֝וִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> Doth not David מִסְתַּתֵּ֥ר <S%H5641><s%> hide עִמָּֽנוּ׃ <S%H5973><s%> O אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> me O God בְּשִׁמְךָ֣ <S%H8034><s%> by thy name הוֹשִׁיעֵ֑נִי <S%H3467><s%> Save וּבִגְבוּרָתְךָ֥ <S%H1369><s%> me by thy strength תְדִינֵֽנִי׃ <S%H1777><s%> and judge
אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> O God שְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> Hear תְּפִלָּתִ֑י <S%H8605><s%> my prayer הַ֝אֲזִ֗ינָה <S%H238><s%> give ear לְאִמְרֵי־ <S%H561><s%> to the words פִֽי׃ <S%H6310><s%> of my mouth

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For זָרִ֨ים ׀ <S%H2114><s%> For strangers קָ֤מוּ <S%H6965><s%> are risen up עָלַ֗י <S%H5921><s%> against וְֽ֭עָרִיצִים <S%H6184><s%> against me and oppressors בִּקְשׁ֣וּ <S%H1245><s%> seek נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> after my soul לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> have not שָׂ֨מוּ <S%H7760><s%> they have not set אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> God לְנֶגְדָּ֣ם <S%H5048><s%> before סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> before them Selah

הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> Behold God עֹזֵ֣ר <S%H5826><s%> [is] mine helper לִ֑י אֲ֝דֹנָ֗י <S%H136><s%> the Lord בְּֽסֹמְכֵ֥י <S%H5564><s%> [is] with them that uphold נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> my soul
[יָשֹׁוב כ] (יָשִׁ֣יב <S%H7725><s%> break ק) הָ֭רַע <S%H7451><s%> evil לְשֹׁרְרָ֑י <S%H8324><s%> unto mine enemies בַּ֝אֲמִתְּךָ֗ <S%H571><s%> in thy truth הַצְמִיתֵֽם׃ <S%H6789><s%> cut them off

בִּנְדָבָ֥ה <S%H5071><s%> I will freely אֶזְבְּחָה־ <S%H2076><s%> sacrifice לָּ֑ךְ א֤וֹדֶה <S%H3034><s%> unto thee I will praise שִּׁמְךָ֖ <S%H8034><s%> thy name יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for טֽוֹב׃ <S%H2896><s%> for [it is] good

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> from מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all צָ֭רָה <S%H6869><s%> me out of all trouble הִצִּילָ֑נִי <S%H5337><s%> For he hath delivered וּ֝בְאֹיְבַ֗י <S%H341><s%> [his desire] upon mine enemies רָאֲתָ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> hath seen עֵינִֽי׃ <S%H5869><s%> and mine eye
